kpi.name: M1008C246

kpi_info.title: CONNECTION DROPS DURING INTER RNC HHO CAUSED BY HSPA SCC
kpi_info.use: The number of user plane drops during outgoing Inter-RNC Intra-frequency HHO triggered by HSPA serving cell change. This counter is updated only for the HSPA serving cell before the HHO operation. UPDATED:When the UE does not respond with RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or CN with RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND and the source-RNC either moves the UE to local-FACH state waiting for RRC re-establishment (if T315>0) or releases the connection with RANAP: IU RELEASE REQUEST (if T315=0).

kpi.kpi_alias: CONNECTION DROPS DURING INTER RNC HHO CAUSED BY HSPA SCC
